Translations.Text: avara (kalada) devadutaru, ‘‘akasagalannu mattu bhumiyannu rupisida allahana kuritu sansayave? Avanantu nim'mannu nim'ma papagalinda mukta golisalikkagi mattu ondu nirdista avadhiya tanaka nimage kalavakasa nidalikkagi nim'mannu amantrisuttiddane’’ endaru. Adakkavaru helidaru; nivu kevala nam'mantaha manavaru. Nam'ma tande tatandiru pujisuttiddavugalinda nivu nam'mannu tadeya bayasuttiri. Niviga nam'ma balige spastavada puraveyannu (pavadavannu) tanniri

avara (kalada) devadutaru avarodane helidaru; khanditavagiyu navu nim'mantaha manavaru, adare allahanu tanna dasara paiki tanicchisidavara mele upakara toruttane. Allahana appane illade nim'ma balige spastavada puraveyannu (pavadavannu) taralu namage sadhyavilla. Visvasigalu, allahanalli matra bharavase idabeku

innu, navu allahanalli bharavase yakidabaradu? Nijavagi, namage nam'ma darigalannu torisikottavanu avane. Nivu namage niduva sakala kirukulagalannu navu sahisikolluvevu. Bharavase iduvavarella allahanalle bharavase idabeku

Dhikkarigalu, tam'ma (kalada) dutarodane, ‘‘navu khandita nim'mannu nam'ma nadininda horagattuvevu. An'yatha nivu nam'ma samajakke marali barabeku’’ endaru. Aga avaredege (dutaredege) avara odeyanu higendu divya sandesavannu kalisidanu; navu akramigalannu khandita nasamaduvevu –
mattu avara balika navu bhumiyalli nim'mannu nelesuvevu. Idu, nanneduru nilluva bhaya hagu nanna eccarikegala bhaya ullavarige (iruva subhavarte)
avaru ondu tirpannu apeksisidaru mattu pratiyobba hathamari, ahankariyu nasavadanu
